document.full_text: five aging world war ii pilots who once flew over the treacherous terrain of the himalayan mountains reunited in charleston, south carolina on wednesday to swap stories of the first american airlift.
document.title: world war ii "hump" pilots meet for final reunion
lines_and_colors: five aging world war ii pilots who once flew over the treacherous terrain of the himalayan mountains reunited in charleston, south carolina on wednesday to swap stories of the first american airlift.
